resources.string: This app does not store any information or send any data over internet. Settings and Highscores are saved locally

Flattris is a Tetris variant using a 3x3 block size at max. All possible blocks ranging from 1x1 to 3x3 are possible to find in the game. Build a flat as high as possible for most points.

 Flattris has 3 game modes:
	 Infinity Mode, meaning each block can be placed anywhere, score points for rows removed, the game finishes when the top of the screen is reached

	 Challenge Mode, each block can only be placed where there is a neighbour that is one size smaller than the block you try to place. Thus size 2 blocks can only be placed next to size 1 blocks, Size 3 blocks can only be placed next to size 2 blocks

	 Construction Mode, each block can only be placed where all lower valued neighbour are present Thus size 2 blocks can only be placed next to size 1 blocks, Size 3 blocks can only be placed next to both a size 2 and a size one block

	 Speed increment means that each time a row is removed blocks start falling faster.

	 The more difficult the game mode the more points you score, bigger blocks also score more points, and finally having the speed increment on will also award more points.
